"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a4821e6368723eac432100#post_54a4821e6368723eac432100

Oh no, Don't get me wrong, He's a nice guy.

Fact he's the one that got me my Wii U.

But after my moms last husband I'm worried, and then knowing that he's living with us now I kind of not comfortable at the moment.

You see, my "Step Dad" was a nice guy at first and then right when they got married he showed his true colors, and they weren't bright that for sure. So I just don't want to go through that again.
